metadata.title: Airplane
metadata.shortDescription: A small, stubby, rounded-shaped airplane is flying in the sky.
metadata.longDescription: A small, short, round-shaped airliner is flying in the sky. It has two large wings with rounded tips and small tail surfaces. It also has several round windows on the sides, as well as a front cockpit window.

hotspots.title: Cabin window
hotspots.description: It has a circular shape and appears to be made of glass.

hotspots.title: Cockpit windshield
hotspots.description: It is large and appears to be made of glass.

hotspots.title: Wings
hotspots.description: They are large and have a rounded tip. They extend from the central part of the plane.

hotspots.title: Fuselage
hotspots.description: The main body of the plane is round and elongated. It has no sharp edges and is rather squat.

hotspots.title: Vertical stabilizer
hotspots.description: It has a round shape at the front and a square shape at the back. It resembles a shark's fin.

hotspots.title: Horizontal stabilizer
hotspots.description: It has a round shape at the front and a square shape at the back. It resembles a shark's fin. It is smaller than the vertical one.
